mapper.select: SELECT A.branch_id, A.bank_code, C.bank_name, A.branch_name, A.branch_code, A.province_code, D.region_name AS province_name, A.city_code, E.region_name AS city_name, A.district_code, F.region_name AS district_name, A.address, A.branch_logo, A.branch_contact, A.branch_contact_cellphone, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'N' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'F' THEN '冻结' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '删除' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, B.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, B.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM bank_worker_base.bank_branch A LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.system_admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_id LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.bank C ON A.bank_code = C.bank_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping D ON A.province_code = D.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping E ON A.city_code = E.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping F ON A.district_code = F.region_code WHERE A.branch_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.data_status = #{arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT A.branch_id, A.bank_code, C.bank_name, A.branch_name, A.branch_code, A.province_code, D.region_name AS province_name, A.city_code, E.region_name AS city_name, A.district_code, F.region_name AS district_name, A.address, A.branch_logo, A.branch_contact, A.branch_contact_cellphone, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'N' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'F' THEN '冻结' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '删除' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, B.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, B.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM bank_worker_base.bank_branch A LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.system_admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_id LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.bank C ON A.bank_code = C.bank_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping D ON A.province_code = D.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping E ON A.city_code = E.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping F ON A.district_code = F.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.bank G ON A.bank_code = G.bank_code WHERE G.bank_code = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.data_status = 'N' AND G.data_status = 'N';

SELECT A.branch_id, A.bank_code, C.bank_name, A.branch_name, A.branch_code, A.province_code, D.region_name AS province_name, A.city_code, E.region_name AS city_name, A.district_code, F.region_name AS district_name, A.address, A.branch_logo, A.branch_contact, A.branch_contact_cellphone, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'N' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'F' THEN '冻结' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '删除' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, B.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, B.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM bank_worker_base.bank_branch A LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.system_admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_id LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.bank C ON A.bank_code = C.bank_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping D ON A.province_code = D.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping E ON A.city_code = E.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.china_mapping F ON A.district_code = F.region_code LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.bank G ON A.bank_code = G.bank_code WHERE G.bank_code = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.branch_code = #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.data_status = 'N' AND G.data_status = 'N';
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TotalCount FROM bank_worker_base.bank_branch WHERE branch_code = #{arg0,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_worker_base.bank_branch ( bank_code, branch_name, branch_code, province_code, city_code, district_code, address, branch_logo, branch_contact, branch_contact_cellphone, data_status, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{bankCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{districtCode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchLogo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchContact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchContactCellphone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bank_worker_base.bank_branch SET bank_code = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_code = #{branchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_logo = #{branchLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_contact = #{branchContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_contact_cellphone = #{branchContactCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE branch_id = #{branchID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bank_worker_base.bank_branch SET WHERE branch_id = #{branchID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
